rows.label: qst004003_msg0001
rows.name:
You're looking for info on
anyone suspicious?

rows.label: qst004003_msg0002
rows.name:
I'll have you know, I take guard duty
very seriously! If I'd seen anything
untoward, I'd have reported it!

rows.label: qst004003_msg0003
rows.name: Well, now that you mention it...

rows.label: qst004003_msg0004
rows.name:
The other night, a unit returning
from patrol found itself under attack
from unknown assailants.

rows.label: qst004003_msg0005
rows.name:
Thankfully, they came out of it with
only a few scratches.

rows.label: qst004003_msg0006
rows.name:
But whoever the attackers were,
they seemed to be quite the skilled
marksmen.

rows.label: qst004003_msg0007
rows.name:
Thanks to the efforts of Superbia,
Gula is largely peaceful. That was
the only disturbance I can recall...

rows.label: qst004003_msg0101
rows.name:
To think they would use bows...
Primitive, but I guess it keeps the
expenses down...

rows.label: qst004003_msg0102
rows.name:
I take my unit's budget very seriously,
too! ...Sometimes it's harder than
guard duty, let me tell you...
